short_summary: REDESIGN OF THE CANADIAN SPACE AGENCY INTRANET SITE
description: Description des travaux : Le mandat de l\u2019Agence spatiale canadienne (ASC) est de promouvoir l\u2019exploitation et le d\u00e9veloppement pacifique de l\u2019espace, de faire progresser la connaissance de l\u2019espace par la science et de faire en sorte que les Canadiens tirent profit des sciences et technologies spatiales sur les plans tant social qu\u2019 \u00e9conomique. Le secteur de la transformation num\u00e9rique et des technologies de l\u2019ASC joue un r\u00f4le important en d\u00e9veloppent diverses applications dans le support de ce mandat.

full_summary:
# Canadian Space Agency Intranet Site Redesign
## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Amendment #4

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**RFXS Reference Number**: 9F019-22-0273-B

**Request Title**: Design and Development of a New Intranet Site for the Canadian Space Agency

**Notice #**: 02280171

**Notice Date**: 2023-05-08

### Overview

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is soliciting proposals from qualified Service Providers to redesign and develop a new intranet site on the SharePoint platform. The new intranet site will replace the current Drupal 7 platform, which is approaching end-of-life.

### Objective

The objective of this project is to create a new intranet site on the SharePoint platform, migrating the current intranet site content to the new site before December 31st, 2023. The new site will provide a modern and user-friendly interface, while maintaining the necessary security features.

### Requirements

* Design and development of a new intranet site on the SharePoint platform
* Migration of current intranet site content to the new site
* Integration of necessary security features
* Compliance with CSA's security requirements

### Security Requirements

* The intranet site must be designed with a security level of Protected B
* A designated organization screening (DOS) is required

### Service Provider Requirements

* Qualified Service Providers must have experience in designing and developing intranet sites on SharePoint
* Service Providers must have a security clearance for a minimum of designated organization screening (DOS)
* Service Providers must be able to demonstrate their ability to meet the security requirements

### Selected Service Provider

The selected Service Provider will be responsible for designing and developing the new intranet site, as well as migrating the current site content. The Service Provider will work closely with the CSA team to ensure a successful implementation.

### Proposal Submission

Proposals must be submitted by the closing date of May 8th, 2023. Late proposals will not be accepted.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sophorn Sok at (514) 708-6583 or sophorn.sok@asc-csa.gc.ca. The contact information is also listed in the attached documents.

**Important**: Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Interested Service Providers can contact RCNMDAI-NCRIM
